headline: OpenAI growing at 'wild pace,' there's never enough compute: CFO
summary: Over 700 million people are actively using OpenAI products like ChatGPT each week, according to OpenAI CFO Sarah Friar, and the artificial intelligence developer is on track for $13 billion in revenue this year. Friar sits down with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi at the 2025 Goldman Sachs Communacopia and Technology Conference to discuss the AI firm's exponential growth, the future of compute, and its Stargate initiative for broadening AI infrastructure, and the prospects of an IPO in the future. For more CEO commentary from the 2025 Goldman Sachs Communacopia and Technology Conference, catch Brian Sozzi's full interviews with the chief executives from Verizon Communications (VZ) and Snowflake (SNOW). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: UBS Puts AST SpaceMobile Stock on Hold. The Shares Fall to Earth.
summary: Satellite start-up AST SpaceMobile operates in a crowded space. After Elon Musk’s Starlink boosted its advantage, UBS issued a downgrade of AST.

headline: Gen Z flocks to Pinterest as AI enhances shopping experience: CEO
summary: Pinterest (PINS) CEO Bill Ready sits down with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi at the 2025 Goldman Sachs Communacopia and Technology Conference to talk about the social media platform's growth within user demographics like Gen Z and the site's adoption and deployment of AI tools to enhance online shopping experiences. For more CEO commentary from the 2025 Goldman Sachs Communacopia and Technology Conference, catch Brian Sozzi's full interviews with the chief executives from Verizon Communications (VZ) and Snowflake (SNOW). headline: Apple debuts iPhone 17
summary: CUPERTINO, Calif., September 09, 2025--Apple® today announced iPhone® 17, featuring the new Center Stage® front camera that takes selfies to the next level; a powerful 48MP Fusion Main camera with an optical-quality 2x Telephoto; and a new 48MP Fusion Ultra Wide camera that captures expansive scenes and macro photography in more detail. headline: SailPoint keeping close eye on AI agents' disciplines: CEO
summary: Identity security developer SailPoint (SAIL) came out with second quarter earnings results that beat estimates, reporting that annual recurring revenue grew by 28% and raising its full-year revenue guidance. SailPoint founder and CEO Mark McClain joins Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi and senior reporter Allie Canal for a conversation on the company's earnings takeaways, the rapid deployment of AI service agents across Big Tech, SailPoint's newest cybersecurity products, and its competitive relationship with CrowdStrike (CRWD). For more CEO commentary from the 2025 Goldman Sachs Communacopia and Technology Conference, catch Brian Sozzi's full interviews with the chief executives from Verizon Communications (VZ) and Snowflake (SNOW). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
